structure.name: ymyl-box
structure.title: YMYL box
structure.description: This box contains the resume, which normally printed bofere the content to ensure the visitors, that the page follows the YMYL principles, and responsible people are mentioned.

options.title: Before the content
options.description: Automatically print the box before the content (if any author is picked for the page)

fields.title: Other printing options
fields.text:
The YMYL can be printed in any other place:
  • via shortcode: [fcp-ymyl-box]
  • via PHP code: <?php if(function_exists('fcp_ymyl_boxe')){fcp_ymyl_boxe();} ?>
fields.description: The box can be printed only once. Second possible box will be removed.

fields.name: ymyl-content
fields.title: YMYL box content
fields.description: Something like: "Further content was created or checked and verified by %name.". Use %name sign to mark the place for printing the authors names.

options.title: After the content
options.description: Automatically print the boxes after the content (if an author is picked for the page)

fields.title: Other printing options
fields.text:
The author boxes can be printed in any other place:
  • via shortcode: [fcp-author-boxes]
  • via PHP code: <?php if(function_exists('fcp_author_boxes')){fcp_author_boxes();} ?>
fields.description: The box (or the boxes set in case of few authors) will be printed only once.
